attributes.action: Throw Rishi Sunak out of parliament
attributes.additional_details: Rishi Sunak has overthrown Boris Johnson and Liz Truss, he has damaged the UK, he should not be allowed to continue as an MP in parliament
attributes.background: Remove Rishi Sunaks status as an MP, throw him out of parliament

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
